name: EndRush
description:
A short and simple platforming game for Brackey's game jam 2022.1.

Only goal: get to the end. If your trail catches up to you, you die and restart.

CONTROLS:  A/D or Arrow keys to move, SPACE to jump.

Credits: Everything made by me except for movement. Various tutorials used, as this is my first game using Unity. (I made games on Scratch prior to now, profile link is https://scratch.mit.edu/users/SuperSledge169/ if you want it.
